shortDescription: ASUS RT-AC* and RT-N* devices with firmware through 3.0.0.4.380.7378 allow JSONP Information Disclosure such as the SSID.
vulnerabilityName: ASUS rt-ac1750_firmware Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
